fact: Breaking Bad's most shocking twist? Walter White was supposed to die in Season 1, but the writer's strike gave him a longer shelf life.
reply: Imagine missing out on Heisenberg's empire because of some writer's strike drama. Talk about dodging a bullet!
youtube_description: Breaking Bad's Walter White nearly had his final bow in Season 1. How does that change your binge-watching plans? #breakingbad #mindblown #facts #series
